channel.title: Posts on 1st International Workshop on the Evaluation of Model-DrivenEngineering Contributions
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on 1st International Workshop on the Evaluation of Model-DrivenEngineering Contributions

item.title: Welcome!
item.author: mosser.sebastien@uqam.ca (Sébastien Mosser)
item.description: 1st international workshop on the Evaluation of Model-Driven Engineering Contributions This workshop is co-located with MODELS, in Munich. It will be a discussion-based event, calling for extended abstracts to kickstart such discussions. We will host a keynote by Lionel Briand (University of Luxembourg) about empirical evaluation. In software engineering (SE), the intrinsic softness of the element under study often makes the evaluation process fuzzy. Moreover, Model-Driven Engineering (MDE) faces specific challenges which are not so profound in other areas of software engineering.
